intro.paragraph1: I'm Christian Rodríguez. I'm a software engineer passionate about building things that make life easier for others. When I'm not sitting at my desk, I'm either on my bike or spending time with family.
intro.paragraph2: I write about software engineering, life lessons, and whatever else is worth sharing. Here's some of my latest:

blog.title: Blog
blog.rssDescription: Software engineering, life lessons, and thoughts worth sharing by Christian Rodriguez
